column5: We are now accepting applications for the Health Data Science course for January 2022. Please visit our website for more information.Informing Health Improvements through Large-Scale Data ProcessingIf you are working in a healthcare role that involves analysing health data, this MSc Health Data Science degree, could accelerate you into one of the fastest growing areas in the UK.This course is designed to develop the essential skills and knowledge you’ll need as a Health Data Scientist. Our degree offers strong emphasis on practical and analytical skills that you can apply in the workplace and could make you more employable. It is available as a one year full time or three years part time course.
column7: Please visit our website for the Health Data Science course fee information.
